pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake Update 8 (2201.8.9) Swan Lake Update 8 (2201.8.9) is the ninth patch release of Ballerina 2201.8.0 (Swan Lake Update 8) and it includes a new set of bug fixes to the language. ## Update Ballerina Run the command below to update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.8.9 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/). ``` $ bal dist pull 2201.8.9 ``` ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install. ## Language updates ### Bug fixes To view bug fixes, see the [GitHub milestone for Swan Lake Update 8 (2201.8.9)](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A2201.8.9+is%3Aclosed+label%3ALang%2FExpressions%2FQuery+label%3AType%2FBug).
